message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I appreciate your reasonable starting point, but I think a 55-45 split is more reflective of the risk I'm taking by rejecting your initial offer.
I see you're willing to negotiate, but I still think I deserve the bigger share. Meet me in the middle of our previous offers.
Time is running out, and the money is shrinking. I'm willing to split the difference of our last offers, but this is my final concession.
